question_text: Which of the following is true about the demarcation point in a fiber installation?
answer_options: It is located inside the router provided by the ISP
It defines where the ISP’s optical network ends and customer wiring begins
It is another term for the RJ45 port on an ONT
It indicates the maximum supported bandwidth of the fiber link
correct_answer: It defines where the ISP’s optical network ends and customer wiring begins
explanation: The demarcation point is the boundary between ISP-managed infrastructure and customer-managed wiring and devices.
